physical_appearance:This is a photograph of the Hotel des Indes in Batavia (Jakarta) in Indonesia. There is a courtyard in the center of the photograph
 with a building complex surrounding it. There are a few tall trees in the center of the photograph
 and behind the buildings on the left. All the buildings have shuttered windows. The edges of the photograph are rounded. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Hotel des Indes in Batavia (Jakarta) in Indonesia. There is a courtyard in the center of the photograph, with a building complex surrounding it. There are a few tall trees in the center of the photograph, and behind the buildings on the left. All the buildings have shuttered windows. The edges of the photograph are rounded. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
